message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM. 

The paper focuses on Spatio-Temporal Video Question Answering, which involves understanding both visual concepts and temporal relationships in videos to answer natural language questions. This task is highly relevant to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a unified framework that uses grounded evidence to answer questions, which involves machine learning techniques such as deep learning (cs.AI) and probabilistic modeling (cs.LG). Finally, the paper uses the TVQA+ dataset, which involves object detection and tracking in videos (cs.MM).
